name: Pico Harvest
description:
In Pico Harvest, you find yourself in charge of a vivid farm, including hen, cows and an acre. People from the city will be coming to your farm soon, asking for goods like eggs, milk, fish, cabbage or wood. Fulfill their needs by taking care of your livestock and field and bringing them what they desire.

Pico Harvest is a fast-paced time-management game. Keep an eye on your farm to see where a hand is needed. Water your field and care for your animals to have them produce the goods your customers desire.

Progressing through levels of increasing difficulty, you have to keep the timer up by serving the people quick and efficiently; once your time runs out, your game is over. Good luck in making it to the game's highscore-table.

Press Alt+Return to toggle between fullscreen- and window-mode.

PICO Harvest is coming with a stunning soundtrack by @grubermusic

If you enjoy harvesting games, be sure to check out this games big brother, "Harvest Life" on https://store.steampowered.com/app/649790/Harvest_Life/
